posts.post_title: WTB T205 SGC 3 or 4 Hall of Famers
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jason
I'm looking to treat myself and would be willing to buy a well centered SGC 30 - 50 graded version of one of the following T205 hall of famers.

Evers
Chance
Marquard
Collins (Closed Mouth)

Don't care what brand is on the back or any of that jazz. I will pay T205.org value on these and can pay paypal or money order.

Thanks for looking and hope to deal with someone. You can email me at kehfee@gmail.com
